name: Microwave Samsung (GE88SUT/BW)
origAbout: The +30 CEK Grill function provides the perfect texture for your food, making it look surprisingly delicious. The cooking time is extended by 30 seconds to create a browned meal using the grill. The durable BIO ceramic coating is easy to clean and won't scratch. Its smooth surface can be cleaned without the use of harsh cleaning agents. In addition, the coating does not fade after long-term use. Quick Defrost function allows you to defrost food quickly and evenly. You can enjoy the great taste of your favorite food at any time of the year. Odor removal mode allows you to quickly and easily remove unpleasant odors from the cooking compartment.
